text:
Three persons of a family allegedly committed suicide at Tulsi Nevra village in the district on Monday.

“The bodies of the siblings, including two teenage girls and their brother, were found hanging from the ceiling of their house in Tulsi Nevra village under Nevra police station limits,” a senior police official said.

The deceased were identified as Durga (16), Sumitra (19) and Bhupendra Sahu (22), he said.

A suicide note was recovered from the spot, which said nobody should be blamed for the act, he said.

- PTI
title: Three siblings found dead
